setDetails.setDescription:
The CANVAS Digital Gold Index is an investment that brings together new and traditional asset classes, in a balanced 50/50 weighting of Digital Gold (Bitcoin) and Traditional Gold (PAX Gold).

The Digital Gold Index is operated by CANVAS, a leading investment platform that unlocks investor access to the world of Decentralised Finance.

Why this index?
CANVAS has created a single index that provides investors an easy way to gain exposure to these diverse asset classes.
Gold, a traditional store of value has provided safe haven for investors for over six thousand years. Digital Gold (Bitcoin) on the other hand is a new technology that came into existence over ten years ago. Bitcoin has been likened to the digital equivalent of gold, as it allows investors to store value in a non-government controlled form outside of paper currency or traditional assets classes. It's a barer asset whose ownership is immutably recorded on a public ledger refer to as a blockchain.
CANVAS's theory behind this index is it provides a blended exposure to one of the most enduring asset classes, alongside what is seen to be the future of finance. All without the cost, logistical and security challenges of having to self custody these bearer assets.

Index Methodology:
The index will be monitored and re-balanced to 50/50 when a single asset allocation deviates by more then 25%.

Fees:
A streaming fee of 0.95% p.a. is charged for CANVAS to manage the index.

What is PAX Gold?
PAX Gold (PAXG), is a precious metal backed cryptocurrency designed to be a safe haven asset and store of value. PAX Gold is presented as an industry leading 100% reserved gold standard. Each token is backed by one fine troy ounce (t oz) of a 400 oz London Good Delivery gold bar, stored in Brinkâ€™s vaults. If you own PAXG, you own the underlying physical gold, held in custody by Paxos Trust Company. Furthermore, PAX Gold is the only gold token that you can redeem for LBMA-accredited Good Delivery gold bullion bars (with smaller amounts redeemable through a network of physical gold retailers). Paxos is a trust company and custodian, regulated by the New York State Department of Financial Services. A nationally ranking auditor will attest to the matching supply of PAXG tokens and underlying gold every month.

What is Bitcoin?:
Bitcoin is a digital currency that was introduced to the world in January, 2010. Bitcoin is a cryptocurrency that can be described as a non-governmental controlled store of wealth. It has a limited supply of 21 million coins, which is intended to create scarcity. New bitcoin are created through a process referred to as Mining, which is a verification mechanism used to confirm the legitimacy of transactions. Bitcoin is an inherently international currency with no ties to any nation or economy, meaning it is freely available for usage worldwide. Bitcoin's price has risen astronomically over the last few years gaining attention from investors worldwide as well as financial institutions.

THE RISK OF INVESTING IN CRYPTOCURRENCIES OR CRYPTO RELATED ASSETS IS SUBSTANTIAL AND CAN RESULT IN A COMPLETE LOSS OF FUNDS. INVESTORS SHOULD CAREFULLY CONSIDER WHETHER SUCH AN INVESTMENT IS SUITABLE FOR THEM IN LIGHT OF THEIR FINANCIAL CONDITION. INVESTORS SHOULD SEEK INDEPENDENT, PROFESSIONAL LEGAL, TAX & INVESTMENT ADVICE. PAST PERFORMANCE IS NOT INDICATIVE OF FUTURE RESULTS
setDetails.managerDescription: CANVAS is an investment platform enabling secure and easy investments into decentralised finance. We are the interface between investors and blockchain-based assets. Our goal is to make investing in this new technology accessible, understandable, and successful for everyone.
